comments.text:
*A Quick Celebration of the Pagani Zonda*

For some people, few things are as exhilarating as the raw sound of a 
powerful engine – and with good reason. Drive Channel‘s Chris Harris is one 
such person, and accordingly, has produced a short clip celebrating one of 
the more refined vehicles to grace the planet: the #Pagani #Zonda. The deep 
growl of the car’s 540 horsepower engine plays in the background of the 
clip, which includes stunning shots of the Zonda’s beautiful angles. ﻿
